page.title: 17PROPERTY PRICES
page.content: One of the local estate agents gave us an idea of the value of land and property in the area. Farmland costs about Â£750 to Â£1000 per acre amd the farm buildings would be extra as would any stock. The demand for holiday homes in the area seems to have dropped off a little at present although some are still being looked for. A semi-derelict cottage needing modernisation can be bought for about Â£20 000 while a good three bedroomed one will cost Â£30 000. There is now a lack of tied cottages as they have either been bought as holiday homes as farms have been bought up or they have been allowed to simply fall down as they have become unoccupied.
